text: Kanysh Imantayuli Satbayev (31 March, 1899Чествование академика К. И. Сатпаева // Вестник АН СССР. 1949. № 8. C. 55-57. – 31 January, 1964) was one of the founders of Soviet metallogeny, principal advocate and the first director of Kazakhstan Academy of Sciences.Абдулин А. А. Выдающийся ученый, организатор науки, общественный деятель // Вестник РАН. 1999. № 3. С. 258—230. In 2014, the Kazakh National Technical University was named after Kanysh Satbayev. In 2017, the university was rebranded and became known as Satbayev University. ==Related pages== *List of scientists from Asia == References == Category:1899 births Category:1964 deaths Category:Kazakhstani scientists Category:Geologists Category:Soviet scientists Category:Recipients of the Order of Lenin
title: Kanysh Satbayev
